title: “HEAL” = FORGET, Fraud Failing Frequently 11.12.20
itunes:title: “HEAL” = FORGET, Fraud Failing Frequently 11.12.20
description:
In episode 758, Jack and Miles are joined by comedian Anna Salinas to discuss how the media is already rehabilitating the GOP's image, more of Trump refusing to admit he lost, the Dean Browning and 'Dan Purdy' twitter drama, Trump's latest election fundraiser scam, a USPS worker crying fraud with no evidence, Britney Spears conservatorship update, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. The Media Is Already Rehabilitating the GOP—and Walking America Into a Trap
  2. Nearly 80% of Americans say Biden won White House, ignoring Trump's refusal to concede: Reuters/Ipsos poll
  3. Trump blocks transition as he refuses to accept loss
  4. The incredibly bizarre Dean Browning and “Dan Purdy” Twitter drama, explained
  5. Trump won't back down from legal war as money woes and infighting rage: Sources
  6. To prevent the spread of disinformation by amplifying specific words/phrases, I'm only posting screenshots for now.
  7. Trump solicits ‘election defense’ donations that also finance his new leadership PAC
  8. Governor's pitch to aid Trump appears to benefit her own campaign fund
  9. Trump Ordered to Pay $2 Million to Charities for Misuse of Foundation
  10. Trump used $258,000 from his charity to settle legal problems
  11. USPS Worker Cries Vote Fraud, Recants, Recants Recantation. Must Be Project Veritas!
  12. Britney Spears to receive a co-conservator as court declines to revoke her father's guardianship
  13. WATCH: Ovrkast - Face (feat. Navy Blue)

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
